SqlJson.summary: Represents the JSON datatype in SQL Server.

ctor1.summary: Parameterless constructor. Initializes a new instance of the SqlJson class which represents a null JSON value.

ctor2.summary: Takes a as input and initializes a new instance of the SqlJson class.

ctor3.summary: Takes a as input and initializes a new instance of the SqlJson class.

Null.summary: Represents a null instance of the type.

Value.summary: Gets the string representation of the Json content of this instance.

GetSqlJson.summary: Retrieves the column at ordinal as a .
GetSqlJson.returns: A object representing the column at the given ordinal.
